resources.string: Welcome to Treasure Finder! This game is created by Jenna and Shadman. We hope you enjoy! Click anywhere to continue.

The creators of this game are Jenna and Shadman. For more information about the authors, check out this resource: CMPT276 
 
 You are a captain leading a group of pirates to find the hidden treasures on the island. When you tap "Play Game" button, you will be introduced to a grid. Each cell in the grid represents an area on the island where a treasure chest may be hidden. You will tap on an area where you think the treasure chest is located. If the treasure chest is found in that area, you will see the treasure chest pop up. If there is no treasure chest, then you will see a number that represents the total number of treasure chests present in that row and column. The game will count the total number of taps you have done on areas without any treasure chests. Each tap represents 1hr of time wasted. The objective is to find all the treasure quickly before other pirates discover the hidden treasures!
